nodes.title: UI Backend Binding Tree
nodes.excerpt: Backend-to-UI dataflow for physics surfaces and verification panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
This tree maps how backend physics data and verification outputs surface in the client UI.

Minimal artifact: backend-to-UI dataflow map.
nodes.summary: Backend-to-UI dataflow for physics surfaces and verification panels.

nodes.title: Energy Pipeline Binding
nodes.excerpt: Energy pipeline outputs wired to UI panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
Energy pipeline outputs originate in server/energy-pipeline.ts and flow through API routes to client hooks and panels (client/src/hooks/use-energy-pipeline.ts, client/src/components/EnergyFluxPanel.tsx, client/src/components/energy-pipeline.tsx, client/src/components/live-energy-pipeline.tsx).

Minimal artifact: energy pipeline dataflow.
nodes.summary: Energy pipeline outputs wired to UI panels.

nodes.title: Curvature and GR Bricks
nodes.excerpt: Curvature brick dataflow to GR panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
Curvature and GR bricks are serialized by server/curvature-brick.ts and server/gr-evolve-brick.ts, exposed via server/routes/physics.curvature.ts, and consumed by client/lib + hooks (client/src/lib/curvature-brick.ts, client/src/hooks/useGrBrick.ts, client/src/hooks/useGrEvolveBrick.ts) into panels (client/src/components/CurvatureTensorPanel.tsx, client/src/components/CurvatureSlicePanel.tsx).

Minimal artifact: curvature brick flow map.
nodes.summary: Curvature brick dataflow to GR panels.

nodes.title: Warp Pipeline Binding
nodes.excerpt: Warp viability and render pipeline mapped to UI.
nodes.bodyMD:
Warp pipeline uses modules/warp/warp-module.ts and server/routes/warp-viability.ts, with client adapters (client/src/lib/warp-pipeline-adapter.ts) feeding panels (client/src/components/AlcubierrePanel.tsx, client/src/components/WarpBubbleGLPanel.tsx, client/src/components/WarpProofPanel.tsx).

Minimal artifact: warp pipeline binding summary.
nodes.summary: Warp viability and render pipeline mapped to UI.

nodes.title: Collapse Benchmark Binding
nodes.excerpt: Collapse benchmark outputs to HUD panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
Collapse benchmark routes (server/routes/benchmarks.collapse.ts) return shared/collapse-benchmark.ts payloads that drive HUDs (client/src/components/CollapseBenchmarkHUD.tsx, client/src/components/CollapseBenchmarkHUDPanel.tsx).

Minimal artifact: collapse benchmark HUD map.
nodes.summary: Collapse benchmark outputs to HUD panels.

nodes.title: Simulation API Binding
nodes.excerpt: Simulation endpoints mapped to UI surfaces.
nodes.bodyMD:
Simulation endpoints in server/routes.ts and server/services/scuffem.ts feed client adapters (client/src/lib/simulation-api.ts) and pages (client/src/pages/simulation.tsx).

Minimal artifact: simulation API flow.
nodes.summary: Simulation endpoints mapped to UI surfaces.

nodes.title: Hardware Telemetry Binding
nodes.excerpt: Hardware ingest endpoints wired to UI controls.
nodes.bodyMD:
Hardware ingest endpoints in server/helix-core.ts feed client hooks (client/src/hooks/useHardwareFeeds.ts) and panels (client/src/components/HardwareConnectModal.tsx, client/src/components/SpectrumTunerPanel.tsx, client/src/components/VacuumGapSweepHUD.tsx, client/src/components/LightSpeedStrobeScale.tsx).

Minimal artifact: hardware telemetry binding map.
nodes.summary: Hardware ingest endpoints wired to UI controls.

nodes.title: Knowledge and Docs Binding
nodes.excerpt: Knowledge ingestion surfaced in doc panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
Knowledge endpoints (server/routes/knowledge.ts, server/services/knowledge/corpus.ts) are surfaced via client panels (client/src/components/DocViewerPanel.tsx, client/src/components/CoreKnowledgePanel.tsx, client/src/components/AgiKnowledgePanel.tsx).

Minimal artifact: knowledge panel dataflow.
nodes.summary: Knowledge ingestion surfaced in doc panels.

nodes.title: Proof and Verification Binding
nodes.excerpt: Verification outputs mapped to proof panels.
nodes.bodyMD:
Verification and math maturity panels render proofs and audits (client/src/components/MathMaturityTreePanel.tsx, client/src/components/UniversalAuditTreePanel.tsx, client/src/components/verification-tab.tsx) driven by backend verification routes (server/routes/agi.constraint-packs.ts, server/routes/agi.eval.ts).

Minimal artifact: verification panel binding map.
nodes.summary: Verification outputs mapped to proof panels.
